Tutorial.CSR.Env_register
=====================

Policy search module uses A :class:`BanditCSREnv <third_party.compiler_gym.envs.optimization.BanditCSREnv>` to register a base environment.

  :local:

.. currentmodule:: compiler_gym.envs.optimization
